title: Scheduled maintenance
message: We will be updating iNZight Lite from June 26 to July 14, 2023. During this time, iNZight Lite may be unavailable. We apologise for any inconvenience.

title: New Release 2023.06
message: Last month we released the June update for iNZight Lite. This update includes a number of new features and bug fixes. For more information, see the change log.

title: Ongoing server issues
message: We are aware of a server issue causing some users to be disconnected. Please try hard-refreshing the page every few minutes. If you need Lite for anything URGENT (e.g., a test), please email us for a back-up link. Thank you for your patience.
